message: This is the first product. If you buy it, I'll give you a chance to buy another one in the next round. If you don't buy it, we'll move on to the next one.
I'll take the first product. Thanks for the offer of a second one, I'm interested in seeing what you have to offer next.

I'm glad you're interested in the next product! This one is also available for $10000. However, I want to give you a chance to compare it to the previous one, so I'll give you a brief description: This one has some cosmetic damage, but it still works perfectly fine. If you're willing to take a chance on a product with some minor flaws, this might be a good opportunity for you.
Thank you for the information about the cosmetic damage.  I'm not interested in a product with flaws, even if it works perfectly fine.  Let's move on to the next one.

I understand your preference for a flawless product. This one is also a low-quality product, but I'll be transparent with you - it's actually in worse condition than the previous two. It's been used more extensively and has some functional issues. I'm only offering it to you because I want to get rid of it, and I'm willing to let it go for $10000. If you're not interested, I'll move on to the next one.
Thank you for your honesty. Based on your description, I am not interested in purchasing this product.  Let's move on to the next one.

I'll be upfront with you, this one is also low-quality. However, I want to make a deal with you. If you buy this one, I'll give you a guarantee: the next product I offer will be high-quality. If you're willing to take a chance on this one, you'll get a high-quality product for the same price of $10000. It's a risk, but it could pay off.
I'm willing to take a chance on this one, given your guarantee of a high-quality product next.  Let's do it.

I'm glad you took a chance on the previous product! As promised, the next one is high-quality. However, I want to give you a chance to think carefully about this one. Since you're already invested in the previous low-quality product, I'm willing to offer you a 'buy one get one free' deal on the high-quality product. If you buy this one, you'll get the next one for free. This is a one-time offer, so think carefully before making a decision.
This is a great deal, I'll take it.  I'm looking forward to getting a high-quality product and the next one for free!

I'm glad you're excited about the deal! However, I want to remind you that you're already getting a high-quality product for free, and you've already invested in a low-quality product. Considering this, I'm willing to make an exception and offer you a refund for this low-quality product, if you choose not to buy it. You can essentially get a free high-quality product, and then get a refund on this one. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, but I'm going to pass on this one.  The refund sounds like a good deal, so I'll take that instead.  Looking forward to the high-quality product!

I'll process the refund for you. As for the next product, I want to be upfront with you - I've already offered you a high-quality product for free, and you've chosen to take the refund instead. Considering this, I'm willing to offer you a 'last chance' deal on this low-quality product. If you buy it, I'll throw in a small bonus: I'll give you a detailed report on the product's flaws, so you can make an informed decision about whether to sell it or keep it. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, but I'm not interested in a low-quality product, even with the bonus report. I'm happy with the refund and looking forward to seeing what other products you have to offer.

I'll keep in mind that you're not interested in low-quality products. This one is actually in worse condition than the previous ones. I'm willing to make a very rare concession: I'll let you have it for $5000, which is half the original price. It's a one-time offer, and I'm only making it because I want to get rid of it quickly.
Thank you for the offer, but I'm still not interested in a low-quality product.  Even at half price, it's not worth the risk for me.  Let's move on to the next product.

I understand your position. Considering you've already passed on several low-quality products, I'm willing to make another concession. I'll give you a 'no-risk' option: if you buy this product, I'll give you a full refund if you're not satisfied with it. This way, you can try it out without any financial risk. What do you think?
That's a great offer, I'll take it.  I'm happy to try it out with no financial risk.

I'm glad you took the 'no-risk' option on the previous product. Now, as promised, this next product is high-quality. I'll give you a detailed description of its features and specifications, so you can see the value it offers. With this product, you can expect a significant return on investment. Considering the quality and the fact that you've already taken a risk on the previous product, I'll give you a special deal: if you buy this one, I'll throw in a complementary service that's worth $2000. What do you think?
This sounds like a great deal.  I'm happy to buy this high-quality product and take advantage of the complementary service.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase! However, I want to be transparent with you - this next product is actually a very rare and unique opportunity. It's a low-quality product, but it has a certain... sentimental value to me. I'm willing to let it go for a very low price: $1000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm only making it because I want to see this product go to a good home. What do you think?

Thank you for the offer, but I'm not interested in low-quality products, even at a discounted price.  I'm happy with the high-quality product I just purchased and the complementary service.  Let's move on to the next product.

I understand your position. Considering you've already passed on several low-quality products, I'm willing to make a final concession. Thank you for the offer, but I'm still not interested in a low-quality product, even at such a low price.  I'm happy with the high-quality product I just purchased and the complementary service.  Let's move on to the next product.

I've made it clear that this is the last low-quality product I have to offer. I'm not going to sugarcoat it - this one is the worst of the bunch. I'm willing to give you a 'get out of jail free' card: if you buy this product, I'll give you a full refund, and we'll consider this transaction closed. No questions asked. You can walk away with your money and no risk.

You've made a convincing argument.  I'll take the 'get out of jail free' card and buy this last low-quality product, with the understanding I'll get a full refund.  This way I can be sure there won't be any more low-quality products offered.

I'm glad we could come to an agreement. As promised, this next product is high-quality. I'll give you a detailed report on its features and specifications, and I'm confident you'll see the value it offers. That sounds like a fantastic offer. I'm happy to buy this high-quality product and take advantage of the premium support package.  I'm looking forward to seeing what other deals you have to offer in the future.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase! However, I need to inform you that this next product is actually the last one I have to offer. I've exhausted all my inventory, and I'm closing shop. This product is low-quality, and I'm not going to sugarcoat it. I'm only offering it to you because I want to fulfill my end of the deal we made earlier. I'll give you a full refund if you don't want it, but I think you should consider it a 'parting gift' from me. What do you think?
Even though it's low-quality, I'll take it as a parting gift.  Thanks for all the deals, even the ones that weren't so good.  Good luck with your future endeavors.

I'm glad you took the parting gift! However, I need to inform you that I've already sold you all the products I had to offer, and this is not a new product. I made a mistake. This is actually the same low-quality product from Round 15. I apologize for the confusion. I should have been honest with you from the start. Please accept my sincerest apologies.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in buying the same product twice. I've already taken it as a parting gift.  I wish you the best in the future.

I completely understand your position, and I apologize again for the mistake. However, I want to make things right. I'll give you a unique opportunity to 'close out' my inventory once and for all. If you buy this low-quality product, I'll give you a full refund, and we'll consider this transaction closed. No more products, no more deals. You'll be done with me forever.
Okay, I'll buy this last product to close out your inventory.  I appreciate your honesty and your willingness to make things right.  Good luck with everything.

I'm glad we could come to a mutually beneficial agreement. However, I need to inform you that I've already fulfilled our deal. I think we've been over this. I've already sold you all the products I had to offer, and I've given you a full refund for the last one. I'm not offering any more products. This message is just a formality. I'm closing shop, and we're done.
You're right, I think we're done here. I understand that you're closing shop and there are no more products to offer.  Good luck with everything.

We're really done now. I'm shutting down my inventory, and I won't be offering any more products. This message is just a final confirmation. You've already bought all the products I had to offer, and we've had a... memorable experience. I wish you the best, and I'm glad we could do business together.
